text: [Ojo ma'ʙudoni sumo ʙehtarand] Jo kase, ki zaminro qarorgohi [amne] soxt va mijonas cujʙorhoe ravon kard va ʙarojas kuhhoe [ustuvor] padid ovard va mijoni du darjo moneae qaror dod [to oʙi suru sirin ʙo ham najomezand]? Ojo ma'ʙudi digare ʙo Alloh taolo vucud dorad? [Hargiz] Ammo ʙestarason namedonand
